title: 'The Conductor' Tells Story of Female Trailblazer
itunes:title: 'The Conductor' Tells Story of Female Trailblazer
description:
Bernadette Wegenstein, Director of the documentary film "The Conductor" and Marin Alsop, Music Director of the Baltimore Symphony Orchestra, talk about one women’s triumph in the world of classical music.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
